Config.Name: Host Port 1
Config.Description: Required for performing initial OAuth authentication session

Config.Name: BDFR_WAIT (seconds)
Config.Description: Time to wait (in seconds) between bdfr runs

Config.Name: BDFR_AUTH
Config.Description: Run BDFR in authenticated or non-authenticated mode. When set to true, on first run, view docker logs, BDFR provides URL which is needed to complete Oauth authentication. A token will be automatically saved to config file for furture runs.

Config.Name: BDFR_SORT
Config.Description: Download sort type. Values: controversial, hot, new, rising, top

Config.Name: BDFR_NODUPES
Config.Description: Will not redownload files if they already exist somewhere in the download folder tree

Config.Name: BDFR_VERBOSE
Config.Description: NULL or 0=INFO, 1=DEBUG, 2=FULL. increase the verbosity of the program

Config.Name: BDFR_DETOX
Config.Description: True/False. Whether to run detox to clean-up filenames

Config.Name: BDFR_RDFIND
Config.Description: True/False. Whether to run rdfind to replace duplicate files

Config.Name: BDFR_RDFIND_OPTS
Config.Description: Default action: convert duplicates to symlinks. When BDFR_RDFIND set to ture, use this to customize options passed to rdfind. Leave empty for default action

Config.Name: BDFR_SYMLINKS
Config.Description: True/False. Whether to run symlinks, used to change absolute/messy links to relative
